root: ^NanNan: This looks important. Where’s the rest of it?
^Principal: Who is that...? What do you want?
^Principal: Ah, it’s NanNan! I almost didn’t recognize your pretty little face...
^NanNan: Yes, and I’m scared... It’s so creepy in here, Mr. Principal.
^Principal: Don’t worry, I’m here with you. Does anyone else know where you are?
^Principal: Oh, I’m just curious... come closer, NanNan, I can’t see you very well.
